My first ever post!

Hopefully this is the beginning of a long journey of learning and shitposting. This site has been remade about 3 times in serveral horrible ways, before I finally stumbled upon Cobalt - a static site generater written in Rust!

By using Cobalt I was able to recreate my entire personal site in about an hour thanks its fairly simple API and .liquid templating.
